conclusions firstly one of the main contributions of this work lies in confirming that digital transformation in higher education institutions must be adresed as an organizational transformation and in that sense be considered and aligned from thre diferent perspectives organizational socio cultural and technological to achieve synchronize digital transformation in holistic and evolutionary integration over the course weather secondly research aplied to public universities in colombia through the implementation model it shows that the digital transformation is presented progresively through maturity levels none low moderate high very high evidencing how this transformation generates changes in vision and meaning within higher education institutions impacting their culture policies administrative and training activities evaluation proceses pedagogical aproaches teaching research and extension proceses as wel as people imersed in she it is profound change that goes beyond the fact of introducing information technologies indus tria is paradigm shift thirdly from the descriptive analysis caried out it can be said that the majority of colombia public universities are located at level of maturity moderate which implies that for universities the digital transformation begins to be latent concern where they are analyzing their vision and considering making an internal change as wel as change in their university objectives in the medium term by on the other hand they are incorporating digitalization automation initiatives and digital user modifying some governance procedures curicula and or teaching pedagogies however stil do not focus on the disruptive potential digital transformation in heis deployment model of the transformation consequently the investment and use of new technologies becomes with precaution likewise it can be said that its staf students teachers administrative has moderate digital skils and there is stil evidence of resistance to change in the face of digital transformation proceses fourthly it is clear that without adequate conceptual development science could not proced beyond certain stage lewin as the motivation for this research some theoretical and practical implications are derived se figure figure implementation model of digital transformation in institutions of higher education from the analysis of the structural model in conclusion the organizational decisions directly impact the socio cultural and technological aspects and indirectly impact the maturity of digital transformation on the other hand they exhibit an impact positive from the technological perspective in the maturity levels of the transformation digital mediated by the socio cultural perspective likewise the organizational perspective influences the socio cultural and technological dimensions and only the socio cultural aspects they directly influence the maturity levels of digital transformation in this sense the present study makes contribution to the theory by providing evidence empirical evidence of the importance of integrating the organizational socio cultural and technology in order to improve the level of maturity of the digital transformation in the higher education institutions likewise it is confirmed that the decisions and organizational comitments information misionary proceses conclusions administration management and suport administration strategic planing from the high levels of university management have concrete impact on promotion within the maturity levels of digital transformation within the institutions of higher education aditionaly the results sugest that universities should consider injecting their digital transformation eforts into improving socio cultural strategies in place to maximize technology fifthly it is considered pertinent to highlight that this research achieved survey of the public universities in colombia that is universities that are dispersed throughout the national teritory result that alows you to have holistic view of the maturity of digital transformation in public universities in colombia finaly based on the previous reasoning we consider that the model of implementation created is relevant reference framework for universities since contributes to improving the understanding and management of digital transformation proceses that take place inside likewise it is worth highlighting the importance of the instrument of digital transformation proposed as diagnostic and planing tol posible projects for the development of digital transformation strategy as schematic visualization figure consolidates the most important elements important things that heis must take into acount to increase maturity levels in digital transformation proceses linking organizational perspectives socio cultural and technological as whole digital transformation in heis deployment model figure holistic view of digital transformation in heis future lines of research future refinements of the measurement instrument are sugested by aplying new variables moderators that have not ben considered in this study and that could help the understanding of complex resulting relationships for example geographic area date founding of the educational institution cultural context among others new research should focus on an update and analysis of the model of digital transformation of universities in the face of the new scenarios deployed in the period of the pandemic and post pandemic because this research focused its analysis in transition time that is before and during similarly at begining of the investigation it was established as the main basis for the identification of the void of knowledge and construction of the theoretical framework the systematic review of literature in scientific databases future research could integrate new perspectives from other sources of information such as reports from prestigious consulting firms international and or documented experiences of td proceses as wel as an analysisconclusions longitudinal transregional international evolution and prospective vision of the university framed in the context of digital transformation likewise based on the implementation model created it is sugested to generate new models that link the relationship of the third fourth and fifth helix through the digital transformation in universities it is proposed to cary out future studies that include the aplication of mixed methods of research that facilitate adresing broader research questions that provide beter understanding of digital transformation in heis research that measure for example the impact of digital transformation on the competitivenes of companies universities in the reduction of student dropout levels in the universities among others include private universities in the study and or expand its aplication to other countries which which would alow greater number of samples to contrast the results aplying cb sem leading to beter understanding of how these dimensions integrate and complement to guide digital transformation in educational institutions superior it would be very useful if each perspective organizational socio cultural and technological analyzed in this research became research unit so such that it can be depened in its theorization as wel as in concrete strategies for its evaluation and aplication limitations of the study proces instrument of measurement there are some limitations that ned to be noted first the instrument to measure digital transformation focused on higher education institutions being first instrument created new studies variables and or relationships could emerge particular to the contexts of each region country that have not ben considered and that may eventualy modify the relationships proposed in the model secondly the absence of previous studies that adres the isue of creation of instruments for measuring digital transformation in higher education institutions digital transformation in heis deployment model limits its comparative evaluation therefore there is ned to cary out aditional research to be improved later thirdly the creation of the model is directed to the context of the heis and the population the study only included public universities in colombia finaly it is important to clarify that the completion of the thesis work had diferent moments that included the analysis of literature until date on which publishes the article that is considered to date bibliographical reference in similar digital transformation work the creation of the aplied instrument later and which gave rise to the analysis of the context under study ies was created in the year of life apreciate the colaboration and suport of the members of the em research group in this training and learning proces sumary and abstract sumary this document presents the result of the research about the relationship betwen the new digital technologies asociated with digital transformation and company performance organizations the relationship is established through the construction of model conceptual based on systematic literature review rsl in the theory of dynamic capabilities dc and the contribution of some methodologies experiments and validations of resource based vision rbv and resource based vision theories knowledge kbv this study includes the theoretical framework of the topics asociated with the topic raised the systematic literature review rsl the design of the conceptual model and hypotheses the conducting survey and analysis validating the model and analyzing the results in adition the factors that promote digital changes in the organizations and that alow them to take advantage of the digital transformation where they are loking for optimize data based proceses generating value in busines and in the decision making the study alows us to conclude that organizational proceses function as phenomena that have objective realities which can be expresed in causal relationships and measured through data often in real time and that produce knowledge as key element in generating value in organizations the developed model alows identifying the relationship betwen digital transformation and organizational performance that is represented through relationships betwen concepts independent and dependent organizations where it is posible to evaluate the contribution and reliability of each construct and established hypothesis keywords digital transformation organizational transformation bda decision making decision systematic literature review capacities dinámicas transformación digital desempeño organizacional en empresas del sector de energía eléctrica abstract this document presents the result of the research about the relationship betwen the new digital technologies asociated with digital transformation and the performance of organizations relationship determined through the construction of conceptual model based on systematic literature review in the theory of dynamic capabilities dc and the contribution of some methodologies experiments and analyzed validations of resource based vision theories rbv and knowledge based vision kbv the research includes the conceptual recapitulation in the theoretical framework of the topics asociated with the proposed theme the systematic review of the literature rsl the design of the conceptual model and hypothesis the conduct of survey and analysis the validation of the model and the analysis of results as main results it is shown that research has paid litle atention to the factors that encourage or hinder digital and technological changes in organizations to take advantage of digital transformation and especialy big data analytics however today companies sek to optimize data based proceses generating value in busines and decision making it is concluded that the proceses of organizations function as phenomena that have objective realities which can be expresed in causal relationships and measured by means of data on many ocasions in real time that produce knowledge as key element in the generation of value in the organizations with which and through the model developed it is posible to identify that digital transformation and organizational performance can be represented through relationships betwen independent and dependent variables of organizations in which it is posible to evaluate the contribution and reliability of each variable in the constructs and hypotheses established for each causal relationship keywords digital transformation organizational transformation bda decision making rsl systematic literature review dynamic technologies and comunication wos web of science digital transformation and organizational performance in companies in the healthcare sector electrical energyintroduction the importance of digitalization in organizations goes beyond transformation digital and must be focused on the use of technology to generate value in busines and in decision making which alows data to be used in the diferent proceses starting from improving the organizational capacity and mentality asociated with the proper use of information the generation of value and the contribution to asertive decision making through of data use requires the use of digital technologies in order to give way to forms data centric work proceses acording to anand krishna digital transformation is based on advances in digital technologies that have with an exponential sped of change and can modify proceses model of busines organizational structures products and services within market with greater environmental volatility complexity and uncertainty this requires agile and continuous change management proceses to face the chalenges strategic aspects of digital transformation it could be noted that digital transformation is continuous proces of strategic renewal that uses advances in technologies digital technologies to develop capabilities that update or replace the busines model colaborative aproach and the culture of an organization warner wäger the suces of digital transformation depends on changes in proces and operations management and trained profesionals are required in change proces that takes into acount the chalenges of digital technologies reis amorim melao matos organizations sek to use digital technologies to increase sales of integrated products and services increase your productivity through solutions inovations and data management about your interactions with products and services this requires new forms of colaboration betwen distributed networks of actors and creates dependencies betwen actors whose interests may not be fuly aligned likewise it requires an organizational transformation from the strategy of implementation of td until the reorganization of proceses procedures values and introduction capabilities of profesionals pereira durão fonseca fereira moreira vial organizations are aware of the ned for digital transformation to avoid disapear but organizations do not have clarity on the strategy to adopt and how this strategy wil afect the organization as whole pereira et al reis et al schalmo wiliams boardman warner wäger this transformation of data centric ways of working presents chalenges asociated with diferent areas of the organization such as people proceses and technology some two of these are defined in anand krishna people restructuring of organizational competencies and management of the cultural change proceses complexity of project delivery acros multiple organizations in the suply chain the shift from documents to data and impact on busines models that deliver content based on documents technology data standards and transfer protocols integration of plug and play tols and standalone it solutions tols in recent decades the value of it big data and competitive advantage in organizations using resource based view theory rbv or resource based theory rbt dynamic capabilities dynamic capability dc and knowledge based vision theory knowledge based view kbv côrte real oliveira ruivo gupta george ji fan ren foso wamba akter dubey childe mcafe brynjolfson rbv has ben used to evaluate it capabilities and it is shown that competitive advantage of the company is achieved by implementing and using diferent valuable and inimitable ji fan ren et al kbv explores the potential of company to acquire competitivenes in dynamic market context dc theory can solve the problem of maintaining competitive advantage in turbulent environments côrte real et al in globalized and competitive market the organization must update and reconfigure constantly resources to respond to changes in the external environment and develop sustainable competitive advantage and digital transformation could generateintroduction fiften ability to respond to change merendino et al big data is part of the digital transformation and can improve the eficiency of internal operations improve the control of proces performance monitor the performance of tangible resources and intangibles and identify botlenecks in production proceses ineficiencies in the use of the machine and the waste of resources rialti marzi ciapei buso this requires operational flexibility of proceses it systems and big data aplications to suport change and understand how transformation digital can improve the performance of organizations côrte real et al therefore companies must make decisions and sek to optimize proceses based in data companies must define changes in proceses functions culture organizational and profesional capabilities of the organization to be able to adapt to the decision making operation schemes based on real time information and improve your performance in the colombian context companies in the electric energy sector technologies and comunications mining energy planing unit colombia initiative inteligente is considered fundamental input for decision making with respect to government policies adjustments to the regulatory framework articulation of actors and prioritization of actions in the adoption of new technologies research and incentives this map prioritizes the implementation of smart metering technologies on the grid electricity that involves the colection agregation and distribution of masive data under data management and aplication development for electrical grid companies céspedes transformation the concept of organizational transformation ot has changed even since in where it was asociated with second order changes by levy and mery radical changes dep and revolutionary subsequent to this the vision of ot has ben considered in more holistic way by authors such as king guta et al to significantly improve the general performance of the organization in topics such as quality responsivenes cost flexibility among others through planed change later researchers defined organizational transformation as changes fundamental characteristics such as structure proces culture and capacity cha cha from there and seing ot as rapid mini revolutionary and incremental state transitions the term morphing is introduced to describe organizational transformation as changes in comprehensive continuous and dynamic the continuous transformation atributed to ot includes aspects such as change in the range of products and services ofered by the organization as wel as the reconfiguration of resources capabilities and structures of ofer changes in control aproaches planed by timely experimentation cha cha in cha cha compilation of some definitions asociated with organizational transformation within these the central idea of time and the diferences in the conditions of states before and after the change likewise in the definitions presented in table represent phenomenon typicaly this theory represents proceses causals that generate observations in multiple variables in anderson gerbing highlights the potential of structural equation models for development of theories and the validation of constructs in areas such as psychology and social sciences for its part fornel larcker mentions that researchers have begun to demonstrate the advantages of these models with unobserved constructs for estimation of parameters and hypothesis testing in causal models bagozi yi defines structural equation models as procedures statistics for the measurement of which they defined as organization ability to integrate build and reconfigure internal and external competencies to quickly adres environments changing pisano tece shuen tece gary shuen amy for their part eisenhardt martin they relate the importance of capabilities dynamics in the adequate and timely adaptation to the changing environment through reconfiguration of proceses and resources both al chapter theoretical framework makadok defines capabilities as subsets of company resources that they are not transfered the objective of which is to improve the productivity of other resources are capacities depend on the operating conditions of each organization the theory of dynamic capabilities arises from the perspective based on rbv and kbv as an efective theory for the field of strategic management for busines and management of ict this theory maintains that dynamic capabilities alow companies modify your resources to adapt quickly to changing conditions and maintain its competitive advantage rialti et al dc is made up of the ability to detect and configure oportunities and threats and maintain competitivenes through improvement combination protection and reconfiguration of tangible and intangible asets tece proposes dc to face new chalenges such as the ability ity of employes to learn and build new asets integrate strategic asets including capacity technology and based adresing problems with the routine proces in terms of resources proceses products and services that the organization neds to adapt in conclusion in this chapter the conceptual framework of the betwen data the life cycle asociated with transformation digital and the proces of converting big data into information therefore it is considered the big data theory as one of the fundamental defrosting that seks to reduce the forces that maintain the organization at its curent level of behavior continues with the change or movement where one seks to move towards new behavioral paterns and habits of the organization with new values habits behaviors and atitudes and finaly the refrezing where the organization in new state of balance based on culture norms policies and organizational cotanda design and implementation the design of the experiment is based on the folowing hypothesis which we wish to validate does having more information actualy help us make beter decisions wanted conclusions below are the conclusions of this research which they highlight the fulfilment of the stated objectives and purposes conclusions in the development of the conceptual framework close relationship betwen the life cycle asociated with digital transformation and the big conversion proces data in information and knowledge therefore the theory of big data was considered as one of the foundations of digital transformation the maps from the rsl search equation repeatedly present the formation of clusters around big data organizational changes and performance strategy and busines inteligence systems and management technologies and information furthermore direct link was evident betwen big data and organizational performance the proces of the experimental economics experiment and the validation of the model proposed alows us to identify that the proceses of the organizations work as phenomena that have objective and diverse realities which can be expresed in causal relationships and measured through data in many ocasions in real time and that produce knowledge as key element in the generation of value in organizations in the decision making experiment it is shown that truthful and reliable information technological context suported by previous tests and results alows us to have guarante and generates confidence when making decisions this is suported by the fact that participants largely selected the criteria asociated with the technology with information on ev autonomy vs average trips of the organization the regulatory aspect regarding law of which promotes the use of both public and private evs and the aspect related to cost benefit analysis the proposed structural equations model establishes relationship betwen digital transformation focused on big data and organization performance nizacional from of rsl in dc theory and the contribution of some methodologies experiments and analyzed validations of rbv and kbv theories in the proposed structural equations model that establishes the relationship betwen digital transformation and organizational performance shows that the strategy of digital transformation must group together the constructs asociated with the management of physical resources technologies and infrastructure and human resources besides the the organization strategy must be in charge of guaranteing flexibility companies in the sector electrical energy as part of the planing for the next year of your organization it is proposed as an alternative the execution of an enginering project in the energy sector specificaly related to the implementation of mobility system electricity for the operational use of the proceses and transportation by the workers of the organization the electric mobility system includes electric vehicles infrastructure of the charging stations the smart metering system and the final disposal of the bateries to this end the organization is evaluating alternatives and the decision must be made execution or not of the project in period of no more than weks therefore the organization asks you to make the decision in this regard having in kep in mind that if you decide to do it you wil be responsible for the execution supervision monitoring operation and implementation of this project subsequently the folowing information is presented for each of the groups group decision context do you decide to execute the project but group decision context aditionaly the folowing criteria and statements are known the average return on investment of the project is eight years the investment cost of an electric vehicle is two times greater than that of combustion vehicle the operating cost of an electric vehicle is six times les than the of combustion vehicle do you decide to execute the project but group decision context the folowing criteria and statements are known one of your competing organizations the previous year implemented system of electric vehicles like the one proposed by your organization and did not reach the initialy expected results benefits people in general from the company and the comunity have the impresion that electric vehicles are not mature technology the average return on investment of the project is eight years some environmental organizations afirm that the final disposal of the bateries is insuficient therefore greater polution could be generated in the next years advisors and experts from consulting firms afirm that regulation and normativity is incipient this could not provide suficient guarantes for the long term operation of electric vehicles the investment cost of an electric vehicle is two times greater than that of combustion vehicle recent studies show that the cost of the batery which coresponds curently at of the cost of an electric vehicle it decreases depending on the time therefore its cost base wil decrease to in the next years law of which promotes the use of electric vehicles evs both public and private establishes that by at least of vehicles public transport must be electric likewise for bogotá in they must guarante at least twenty fast charging stations the incentives for evs include not having circulation restriction such as peak and plate of discount on soat discount on technical mechanical inspection the tax vehicle wil be setled on of the comercial value curently it is betwen and decre of establishes tarif rate for the anual import of electric vehicles and chargers and for vehicles hybrids the cost of operating an electric vehicle is six times les than the of combustion vehicle studies estimate that busines flets can have system of electric vehicle charging management that optimizes ratio of to that is digital transformation and organizational performance in the initialy expected results benefits people in general from the company and the comunity have the impresion that electric vehicles are not mature technology the average return on investment of the gistic research group for al their contributions and recomendations to junior for his loyalty and unconditional love sumary and abstract vi sumary digital transformation alows organizations to remain and compete in the market through organizational change in educational institutions superior in particular the factors that may influence digital transformation proces in these institutions the present investigation aim to identify these factors under mingers multimethodology the study of yin case and the delphi method the investigation was caried out in stages namely the first stage coresponded to the systematic review of the literature on the digital transformation proces with emphasis in the factors that influence said proces and its coresponding characterization in the second stage the evaluation of the fa ctors identified in the review of the literature by experts under the delphi method aplied to an institution of higher education taking the national university of colombia as case study bogotá headquarters in the third stage the factors agred upon by the participating experts the identification of these factors wil serve as input to begin digital transformation proces in higher education institutions keywords digital transformation higher education institutions factors organization vi factors that influence the digital transformation in the institutions of headquarters digital transformation enables organizations to stay and compete in the marketplace through organizational change in the case of higher education institutions especialy the factors that may influence digital transformation proces in these institutions have not ben identified the present research aims to identify these factors under the mingers multimethodology the yin case study and the delphi method the research was developed in stages namely the first stage coresponding to the systematic review of the literature on the digital transformation proces focused on the factors that influence this proces and its characterization in the second stage the evaluation of the factors identified in the literature review by experts was caried out under the delphi method aplied to higher education institution taking the national university of colombia headquarters bogotá as case study in the third stage the factors agred upon by the participating experts were consolidated the identification of these factors wil serve as input to initiate proces of digital transformation in institutions of higher education keywords digital transformation higher education institutions in the national university of colombia bogotá headquarters methodology methodology is structured set of guidelines or activities to help people to cary out research or interventions generaly methodology is develops implicitly or explicitly within particular paradigm and embodies the asumptions and philosophical principles of the paradigm mingers brocklesby for this research the multimethodology of mingers was proposed which is refers to the use of plurality of methods or techniques qualitative and quantitative in real world intervention the above because this methodology it is complex and multidimensional which alows closer view of reality while the use of single method would be limited vision by combining methodologies or parts of it alows us to build an efective combination to try to comprehensively particular intervention mingers brocklesby this is suported by the paradigm of critical realism which suports the idea of combining diferent research methods what is caled mixed methods research or multimethodology mingers et al critical realism directs atention toward the real problems and their underlying causes mingers et al acording to bhaskar the critical realism goes against the empiricist vision of science embodied in the positivism and the idealist social vision of science embodied in constructivism or interpretivism mingers et al due to the above and to answer the research question the multimethodology of mingers brocklesby based on four phases apreciation asesment of the problem situation expresed by any actor of the situation literature and previous theories mingers analysis wil involve methods of analysis of the methodologies and data obtained in the apreciation stage mingers factors that influence digital transformation in information institutions higher education national university of colombia bogotá headquarters evaluation evaluation of the postulated explanations and propositions afirmed within the research taking into acount the objective of visualizing diferentialy the problem situation mingers action for this investigation it coresponds to the presentation and socialization of the results obtained during the research case study component that is part of multimethodology is the case study this is used as research tol aplied to organizational studies and of administration among others that contributes to the knowledge iment of phenomena individual organizational social and political yin case study can be particular organization project or procedure and there may be multiple cases within research project mingers furthermore the study of case often includes methods such as interviews and questionaires mingers of in this way it alows the researcher to obtain holistic view and capture the significant features of real life events proceses organizational and management international relations and industry evolution yin taking into acount the above the national university was taken as case study of colombia bogotá headquarters given that among the public heis it is the oldest and representative of the country due to its coverage and presence at the national level locations besides it is curently aims to improve an entity organization road society industry by activating significant changes in its properties through combinations of technologies information computing comunication and conectivity the digital transformation is an evolution of the transformation phenomenon enabled by it westerman et al the use of technology to improve the performance of organizations fitzgerald et al the use of new digital technologies social networks devices mobile analytics or embeded devices to enable improvements important busines such as improving customer experience streamline operations or create new busines models mat et al the digital transformation strategy is plan that helps companies companies to direct the transformations that arise due to the integration of digital technologies berghaus back digital transformation encompases digitalization proceses with focus on eficiency and digital inovation with the aim of improving existing physical products hafke et al digital transformation encompases the digitalization of comunication chanels sales and comunication which provide new ways to interact and interact with customers and the digitalization of products and services of company digital transformation also describes the trigering tactical trading movements or strategic through data driven insights and the launch of digital busines models that enable new ways to capture worth kane align strategy workforce culture technology and organization structure to met digital expectations of customers employes and partners hes et al it has to do with the changes that digital technologies can cause in the busines model of company resulting in modified products or organizational structures or in the proces automation these changes can be observed in the increasing demand for internet based media which has led to changes of entire busines models in the industry of the music horlacher et al use of new digital technologies such as social networks devices mobile analytics or embeded devices to enable improvements important busines such as improving customer experience optimize operations or create new busines models morakanyane et al an evolutionary proces that takes it with existing tasks verhoef et al for example reading online texts as pdfs not as paper textboks cerstin mahlow hediger digitalization for its part is transformation proces induced by technology which improves the flexibility agility and responsivenes of organization by simultaneously aligning its operations strategies proceses busines organizational and it structures imgrund et al this refers for for example the creation of new comunication chanels with online customers or mobile through the use of digital forms in order proceses the use of digital surveys or the use of digital aplications which implies transforming the internal and external documentation proceses but does not change the activities of value creation verhoef et al another example worth highlighting is the realization of anotations in pdf document and that these anotations can be viewed with other people cerstin mahlow hediger bockshecker et al sugests that digitization and digitization triger digital impacts of digital transformation the impacts of digital transformation focus on the customer and the organization morakanyane et al the impact on the organization ocurs in thre areas customer experience operational proceses and busines models westerman et al through the customer experience on the one hand the inovation of the services within the organization and on the other hand customer retention and loyalty with this westerman et al regarding operational proceses these can generate efects in improving the eficiency of the organization save costs for both the organization as wel as the customer resulting in the creation of value morakanyane et al regarding busines models the reinvention of this is proces of digital transformation that sometimes involves radicaly changing products or services it ofers and the means it uses for sales this reinvention can lead change the nature of competition in your industry or reconfigure your suply chain value to ofer an eficiency advantage over its competitors westerman et al digital transformation in colombia for the digital transformation proces in colombia the national policy council economic and social conpes defined the document conpes caled national policy for digital transformation and artificial inteligence which aims to aim enhance the generation of social and economic value in the country through the strategic use of digital technologies in the public sector and the private sector to bost productivity and promote the wel being of citizens as wel as generate transversal enablers for the sectoral digital transformation so that colombia can take advantage of the oportunities and face the chalenges related to the fourth industrial revolution ir sic the topic of digital transformation is transversal to al sectors of the country mintic including the educational sector digital transformation in educational institutions higher education educase highlights that traditional higher education is reluctant public service of higher education in the colombian teritory higher education institutions ministry of education national of colombia higher education institutions are clasified acording to their academic character and legal nature higher education institutions ministry of national education of colombia the academic character constitutes the main feature that since the creation of higher education institution defines and gives identity with respect to the competition field of action that in academic terms alows it to ofer and develop educational programs higher in one or another academic modality ministry of national education this academic character is clasified into four categories as folows profesional technical institutions at the undergraduate level technical programs profesionals at the postgraduate level profesional technical specializations technological institutions at the undergraduate level technical programs profesionals and technological programs at the postgraduate level specializations profesional techniques and technological specializations university institutions or technological schols at the undergraduate level profesional technical programs headquarters evaluation of factors characterized by experts aplication of the delphi method once the factors have ben identified and characterized based on the literature review we proced with the evaluation of these through the experts who are part of the case study national university of colombia bogotá campus for this we used the delphi method acording to zapata ebrero this method is prospective that is based on the superiority of forecasting and diagnosis of group with respect to the results that are obtained from an individual the quality of the subjective group opinion is superior to the individual this method involves the selection of experts varela ruiz et al who are sends series of questionaires zapata ebrero in anonymous comunication with fedback zartha sosa et al and in diferent rounds they are asked for their opinion zapata ebrero for this investigation two rounds were aplied considered apropriate by zapata ebrero to obtain information from experts and achieve consensus and stability in their responses the number of rounds to be caried out it is comon to cary out cary out thre rounds and set them in advance of the study however the limitations temporal budgetary and the dificulty of maintaining the comitment of experts they mean that in few cases third round is caried out zapata ebrero the delphi method has thre characteristics the anonymity of the participants fedback or controled fedback and group statistical response zapata ebrero regarding the anonymity of the participants or experts it must be ensured that no participant can know the answers given by the other participants so as their identity zapata ebrero regarding fedback this consists of the transmision of information to the experts before each round in order to know the results obtained in the previous round or stage zapata ebrero the statistical group response arises from the answers given by the experts to the questionaires whose information is treated statisticaly to know the degre of agrement that has ben obtained on the topic analyzed zapata ebrero experts may reflect and reconsider their position due to new aproaches landaeta in this way the delphi method ends when there is consensus in the opinions and these stabilize during the rounds or stages caried out zapata ebrero selection of experts an expert is that individual whose situation and personal resources enable him contribute positively to the achievement of the goal that motivated the initiation of the work delphi landaeta cited in zapata ebrero an expert asumes the responsibility to isue judgments and opinions varela ruiz et al as for the the number of experts must be minimum of and maximum of experts varela ruiz et al for this research two types of experts defined by álvarez torado thus the first type caled afected are key experts who regardles of their titles or hierarchical position they have participated in proceses diagnoses or involved in similar situations know the situation under study in in this case the experts profesors who have held academic administrative positions or have ben advisors to the areas involved have participated in change proceses organizational at the national university of colombia asociated with the implementation of new technology and or change in organizational structure the second type the so caled specialists are experts who have academic experience and profesional experience in the field of digital transformation and changes factors that influence digital transformation in institutions of higher education organization another expert in turn pointed out that public higher education institutions are very traditional who live in contact with the most recent advances in science culture and art which organization one expert indicated that the values and staf beliefs can facilitate or hinder the digital transformation of the company organization and more so in the case of public heis where the staf has ben working for many years linked there is resistance to change one expert also highlighted that for the suces of digital transformation requires the apropriation of culture digital aditionaly pandemic the pandemic generated suden and forced closure of in person teaching leading to teachers and students to unknown terain due to the ned to adapt rapidly to digital learning environments caled online education of emergency this abrupt change has forced universities to evolve towards online teaching in record time implementing and adapting resources available technological resources as wel as involving teachers and researchers who they lack technological capabilities for online teaching morales et al the transition from in person education to virtual education wil have implications significant for the entire learning proces it wil not only modify the methods to evaluate learning outcomes but wil also require review of the skils and comp skils required of students in this new environment likewise there must be adequate infrastructure and technological platforms blackboard modle microsoft teams and servers that alow sustain the virtual workload morales et al for example in the most universities signed contracts with companies like microsoft that provided ofice or teams resources or technological platforms to strengthen the virtual teaching morales et al it is curent economic situation uncertain then some investments wil be neded to improve these capabilities techniques morales et al factors that influence the digital transformation in the institutions of higher education national university of colombia bogotá headquarters conclusions and recomendations in this chapter the results of the research are presented in sumary from the question and its objectives developed through multimethodology by mingers and the case study by yin conclusions the general objective of this research work is to identify the factors that influence the digital transformation in higher education institutions and thre specific objectives emerge from this for its development the multimethodology proposed by mingers the case study designed by yin and the method delphi for the development of objective no systematic review of the literature on the term digital transformation the databases yielded results asociated with this is mainly in the industrial sector this alowed us to identify definitions impacts chalenges and mainly the factors that influence proces of digital transformation the review of the literature in relation to institutions of higher education some universities were identified that have implemented strategies and new proceses with the introduction of technologies as part of their digital transformation proces regarding the factors that influence digital transformation six were identified organizational culture customer orientation digital strategy colaboration expertise digital and organizational flexibility and subfactors resistance to change and leadership which are part of the organizational culture factor it should be noted that in the case of institutions of higher education was not clearly evidenced in the literature the factors that can influence digital transformation proces for the specific objective no the factors that were identified in the objective were taken no and the characterization of each of them was caried out for this was taken into acount the features and specifications mentioned by the authors in each article analyzed finaly for objective no the factors that were identified and characterized in the previous objectives through experts who are part of the national university of colombia bogotá headquarters in order to achieve the objective developed questionaire that is part of the first round of the delphi method which it contained the factors and subfactors identified and which were subjected to evaluation by the selected experts as result of this first round the experts included new factors context busines architecture inovation product management change and technological infrastructure table factors that were identified in the rsl and those proposed by the experts factors identified in the rsl factors proposed by experts organizational culture context resistance to change busines architecture leadership inovation customer orientation change management digital strategy technological infrastructure colaboration digital expertise organizational flexibility once the two rounds of evaluation with experts have ben aplied the factors that obtained greater consensus and were defined as the factors that most influence the digital transformation in public institution of higher education are the folowing in order of consensus table factors that influence the digital transformation in the institutions of higher education national university of colombia bogotá headquarters table factors that influence digital transformation in an hei factor level of influence organizational culture very influential resistance to change very influential very influential leadership customer orientation very influential digital strategy very influential digital expertise very influential organizational flexibility very influential enterprise architecture very influential colaboration not very influential context not very influential inovation litle influential change management not very influential technological infrastructure litle influential the identification of these factors provides an answer to those responsible for the implementation of digital transformation as mentioned by hes et al the most of those responsible for this transformation lack clarity about the diferent options and elements that must be considered as consequence run the risk of not considering important elements or ignoring solutions that are more favorable for specific situation of the organization as result of the evaluation by experts it can be concluded that the factors identified in the research are aplicable to digital transformation proces in higher education institution in this case public hei finaly factor that can influence digital transformation proces and that can make it worse are exceptional situations like pandemic since like it hapened in in few weks changes were necesary in the sector educational especialy in heis from face to face teaching proces to one of type virtual mobilizing the entire organization to new educational and organizational proces with the suport of its technological infrastructure recomendations this research was caried out to respond to the ned of how to start digital transformation proces in higher education institution ies identifying the factors that influence this transformation although this research has as case study the national university of colombia headquarters bogotá for future studies it is proposed to aply the delphi method and the asociated questionaires for the other campuses of the university and thus confirm the factors that can influence digital transformation in public hei even count with greater participation of experts not only belonging to an hei but also external experts who are working on this topic in the educational sector this wil alow us to depen and consolidate these factors and the identification of new factors on the other hand at the end of the aplication of the delphi methodology the researcher had aces to information on the proces that is being caried out of digital transformation in the national university of colombia in which they identified factors of change described in section for this reason these factors were not taken into acount acount in the present research which provides an oportunity for future investigations that alow contrasting the factors that have ben identified in this institution and the results of this investigation and that can influence said transformation proces in the medium term it is proposed to aply the proposed questionaires under the delphi method in private and oficial higher education institutions to contrast the factors identified that influence digital transformation and thus obtain general overview in the colombian context factors that influence the digital transformation in the institutions of higher education national university of colombia bogotá headquarters also it is proposed to investigate how exceptional situations such as pandemic and in especialy the one caused by covid could influence digital transformation proces in an hei finaly in the long term it is proposed with these identified factors and other factors that identify with experts model for adopting digital transformation in heis that alows evaluating these factors anex questionaires used in the delphi method their students who become source of inspiration and are never forgoten sumary and abstract ix sumary analysis of the degre of maturity of the digital transformation of an organization digital transformation dt emerges as proces of incremental disruptive change which begins with the adoption and use of digital technologies then evolves towards deliberate holistic conversion of an organization in the pursuit of creating worth however this path of transformation is not simple so the organizations ned roadmap through which they plan and control said management emerging td maturity models as tol for said functionality under this ned study was caried out in colombian organization in which the evaluation of its td capacity is adresed identifying how this proces has ben developed from the dimensions strategy tasks culture people structure so that it reaches new stage in which digital technologies don limit yourself to separate divisions chanels or functions but are used throughout the entire organization to suport corporate strategies based on the conception that efective digital culture is an intentional and global efort suported by its human talent the objective of this final master thesis is to analyze the degre of maturity of the digital transformation of an organization to achieve this objective mixed non experimental and descriptive research in thre stages characterize the methods models for measuring the maturity of td in an organization based on systematic literature review aply the measurement method model maturity of the td most apropriate to the organization and propose recomendations to the organization to improve its td maturity level as main results has the analysis of the degre of maturity of the td of an organization and the recomendations the entity to improve its td maturity level based on the results of the aplication of mit sloan mtd aligning the organization for its digital future management review and deloite concluding that the progresion in the degre of maturity of an organization td is directly related to the apropriation of the strategy digital within its strategic planing achieving an evolution of the company traditional to an inteligent structure where the investment is not focused solely in the acquisition of technology but in the change of organizational paradigms towards progresive busines model with perspective on the digital future and culture of change keywords digital transformation digitalization busines maturity models digital transformation busines model transformation analysis of the degre of maturity of the digital transformation of an organization abstract analysis of the degre of maturity of the digital transformation of an organization digital transformation dt emerges as an incremental disruptive change proces begining with the adoption and use of digital technologies then evolving towards deliberate holistic conversion of an organization in pursuit of value creation however this path of transformation is not easy so organizations ned roadmap through which to plan and control said management emerging td maturity models as tol for said functionality under this ned study was caried out in colombian organization which adreses the evaluation of its dt capacity managing to identify how this proces has developed from the dimensions strategy tasks culture people structure to reach new stage where digital technologies are not limited to separate divisions chanels or functions but are used acros the organization to suport corporate strategies based on the understanding that an efective digital culture is an intentional efort and suported by its human talent the objective of this final master degre project is to analyze the degre of maturity of the digital transformation of an organization to achieve this objective mixed non experimental and descriptive investigation was demonstrated in thre stages characterize the methods for measuring the maturity of dt in an organization based on systematic literature review aply the most apropriate dt maturity measurement method model for the organization and propose recomendations to the organization to improve its level of dt maturity the main results are the analysis of the degre of maturity of the td of an organization and the recomendations to the entity to improve its level of maturity of the td based on the results of the aplication of the mtd aligning the organization for its digital future of mit sloan management review and deloite concluding that the progresion in the degre of maturity of the td of an organization is directly related to the apropriation of the digital strategy within its strategic planing achieving an evolution from the traditional company to an inteligent structure where the investment is not focused only in the acquisition of technology if not in the change of organizational paradigms towards progresive busines model with perspective on technologies and tic comunicationsintroduction the emergence and difusion of radicaly new technologies have given rise to technological revolutions that have drasticaly transformed societies and economies that create new leading industries and have widespread impact on industries existing destroying some and rejuvenating others that is they are the main factor generator of structural change epicoco freman perez perez schumpeter information and comunications technologies ict emerged in the and have ben widely considered the core of the transformation that is curently being experienced in the fourth industrial revolution archibugi castels dosi virgilito gordon le et al lundval perez carlota perez schwab steinmueler tylecote acording to davis haloran of the world economic forum the fourth revolution industrial generates world in which virtual and physical manufacturing systems coperate with each other in flexible way throughout the planet this alows for absolute customization of the creation of new operating models and products through factories inteligent smart factory revolutionizing the structuring of value chains global schwab curently there is transition in the dimensions economic and social of society hyperconected to digitalized world in which busines production and governance models of the traditional economy coexist with those that emerge from the new technological paradigm and welcome its inovations consolidating new digitaly interwoven system in which the models from both worlds interact giving rise to complex ecosystems that are are in the proces of regulatory institutional and organizational adaptation and in which the digital data achieves strategic role as source of economic value creation social and environmental eclac digitalization as conversion and digital transformation as metamorphosis where the the first alows the proces of the second they acelerate and iluminate horizontal proceses introduction global and in the course of change in society and give rise to greater oportunities for transmute and change legal and political measures socioeconomic structures organizational paterns cultural bariers existing busines models and evolution of the paradigms of traditional industrialization and comercialization chen et al colin et al guo et al heredia et al khan peng tao zhai et al this dynamic evolves acording to technological advances because it is synergistic and systemic proces in which advances in one area condition changes in another as wel as for its potential to increase wel being productivity and environmental sustainability where thre dimensions of the economy are diferentiated conected digital and digitized eclac se figure these changes and their aplication in companies can generate resource savings optimize decision making and the posibility of predicting problems ashok et al mota et al peng tao sewpersadh and alow busines models to inovate and at the same time they triger permutations in the value chain with oportunities for market but also with chalenges and competitive presures that require constant technological update aleksev et al gils weigand sewpersadh with positive impacts on the environment in acordance with what is indicated by eclac digital technologies can contribute significantly to promoting the thre dimensions of sustainable development stimulating growth equality and sustainability figure dimensions of digital development and its disruptive efects source adapted from eclac introduction problem statement acording to authors such as alkan cheng et al frank et al guo et al feng li peng tao salume et al shahi sinha and sousa et al romero et al at the time of launching the transformation digital in organizations does not take into acount whether they are prepared to cary out this proces of metamorphosis from strategic busines philosophy that internalize change and inovation sustainable economic situation and culture organizational aceptance of new technologies carijo et al ghobakhlo iranmanesh gils weigand heredia et al mihardjo et al venkateswaran jyotishi that is initiating this disruptive and holistic proces without clear objective beyond acquiring new technologies that improve some operation or that promote the idea of being company at the technological forefront afects the result end of this management proces minimizing it to the purchase of new technology which in in many cases it is not aligned with the reality of the company alkan cale et al frank et al ghobakhlo fathi gileva et al gils weigand guo et al leonardus et al salume et al sousa et al the digital display ofers facilities that do not go hand in hand with the actual operation of many companies which folow the precepts and paradigms from their culture organizational and static and myopic management bordeleau felden feliciano cestero et al guo et al nerima ralyté shahi sinha yamamoto and instead of geting performance and productivity improvements they end up with acquisitions high cost technological technologies to continue with the same gaps that distance the organization of competitivenes optimization and efectivenes caputo et al carijo et al cheng et al de carolis et al gils weigand hanelt et al nerima ralyté reyes et al salume et al sheng et al as digital investments increase companies face paradox of digitization and canot receive the coresponding return but companies that properly performed digital investments can achieve god returns brozi et al cheng et al feliciano cestero et al mahraz et al shahi sinha teubner due to the negative efects of digital transformation short sighted managers may delay its implementation while the efects positive results lead to excesive digital transformation cheng et al guo et al in this way managerial myopia moderates the relationship betwen digital transformation introduction and company performance aghamiri et al guo et al heredia et al sheng et al this situation is agravated by not knowing the curent organizational status or situation without be able to chart path of progres and move incrementaly towards higher degre of digital transformation maturity aghamiri et al brozi et al frank et al ismagilova et al reyes et al strutynska et al likewise this ignorance of the level of maturity of digital transformation in organizations limits its ability to progresively evolve in the development of key capabilities to be sucesful in the new digital era cheng et al christensen et al gileva et al haryanti et al ismagilova et al lorenzo ochoa saleh awny seyedghorban et al sousa zomer et al sousa et al usai et al in sumary the problem that is adresed in this final master thesis is that there is the ned for organizations to evaluate their proceses to discover how they are prepared for digital transformation and how to develop your roadmap se figure in acordance with the principle of the systemic aproach of continuous improvement where if they are not measured or they evaluate the proceses there are no fedback proceses from the various problems indicated here several research questions arise such as how the organization strategic planing should be designed for the achievement of digital transformation what is the apropriate route to folow for the transformation digital why do organizations limit digital transformation to achieving only digitize and or digitization what is the ideal situation for company to cary out the digital transformation what factors and variables triger the generation of digital companies and their sustainability over time what is the degre of maturity of the digital transformation of an organization among others however the research question adresed in this final master thesis is what is the degre of maturity of an organization digital transformation acording to riascos gonzález the proces of measurement analysis and improvement is very important given that what it canot be measured it canot be improved and acording to wiliam thomson kelvin lord kelvin physicist and mathematician british what is not defined canot be measured what is not measured can not be improved it if it is not improved it is always degraded albrecht brumet mulins komisar introduction figure causation framework and problem impact source self made in this argument of the identified problem colombia although it has made progres in consolidation of more proactive and eficient public entities which apropriate and use the information and comunications technologies ict to provide beter services to citizens and optimaly resolve their neds from the government strategy introduction online and with the deployment of the digital government policy pgd since mintic acording to the digital government index during the period national entities have only managed to gain on average points in the implementation of the pgd for their part the teritorial entities have advanced in average points in the implementation of the pgd mintic even though the public digital transformation was established as priority for the government in the plan national development pact for colombia pact for equity and in the articles and of law of dnp mintic with the update of the digital government policy through decre of mintic colombia seks to direct itself in achieving this objective with this evolution the pgd seks to make more digital state reality for this reason for the country it is public digital transformation is esential to make colombia reality modern and competitive understanding it as the proces of exploitation of technologies digital technologies that have the ability to create new ways of doing things in al sectors of public administration generating new development models proceses and the creation of products and services which in turn produce value mainly through of digitization that represents the conversion of data and analog proceses towards formats that can be understod and procesed by machine inas mintic now acording to the objective of copes to increase the generation of social value and economic through the digital transformation of the public sector and the private sector through the reduction of bariers the strengthening of human capital and the development of enabling conditions so that colombia can take advantage of the oportunities and face the chalenges related to the fourth industrial revolution dnp the organization where the digital transformation maturity model mtd was aplied as it was public in nature of regional order and the manager to secondary education in the capital in charge of promote educational oferings the quality and relevance of education guide and lead the formulation and execution of policies plans and programs to guarante the right to education recognizes this objective and aligns it with the digital government policy and the national development plan colombia world power of life dnp in this desire of the organization where the mtd was aplied to promote the use and taking advantage of information and comunications technologies to consolidate competitive proactive and inovative state and citizens that generate public valueintroduction in an environment of digital trust since its management mintic recognizes its ned to constantly evaluate your digital transformation proces to identify oportunities for improvement that wil sucesfuly lead to the achievement of this objective and the establishment of roadmap that alows the planing of the proces its execution controled and measurable the optimization of the resources that fed it and the obtaining of the best posible results goals to answer the research question the folowing objectives have ben established general objective analyze the degre of maturity of an organization digital transformation specific objectives characterize the methods models for measuring the maturity of the transformation digital from literature review aply the method or model for measuring the maturity of the digital transformation more apropriate to the organization propose recomendations to the organization to improve its level of maturity of the digital transformation based on the results of the aplication design of the investigation to achieve the proposed objectives the development of descriptive study was established since this type of study is aimed at measuring the presence characteristics or distribution of phenomenon in an organization at moment of cut over time limiting itself to describing one or several phenomena without the intention of establishing causal relationships with other factors veiga de cabo et al in turn it is considered that there was no intentional manipulation only the phenomena were observed as they were gave in posible lines of research digital transformation state of art this chapter aims to describe the key concepts characteristics constructs importance and impacts of digital transformation this chapter is made up of the folowing sections first that describes the method of the systematic review of literature rsl to obtain information and its subsequent analysis in the second section the diference betwen digital transformation and digitalization from the change in strategic thinking towards organizational competitivenes the third section focuses on the relationship existing betwen digital transformation strategic planing and the value chain the digital transformation in the colombian context is shown in the fourth section and sumary of the chapter is provided in the fifth section and data technologies to generate revenue improve busines replace transform proceses clerck comercial and create an environment for digital busines in which information digital is at the center characterization of maturity models digital transformation the maturity of topic refers to the state of being very advanced or developed for an east and is structured in set of dimensions that together describe the its entirety golhardt et al thus maturity models are analysis of the degre of maturity of the digital transformation of an organization tol used to evaluate qualitative and quantitative capabilities through series of sequential levels which together form an anticipated logical path or desired from an initial state to final state of maturity carijo et al proença borbinha the ms with their organized and systemic structure alow companies evaluate diferent aspects of the organization and compare their levels of maturity with its competitors and with those who present the best practices of the market which makes it posible to develop action guides to reach the highest levels high market maturity carijo et al proença borbinha along these lines digital transformation maturity models mtd help to understand and structure the concept of digitalization carijo et al and provide an estimate of the curent capabilities and maturity of organizations and general directions towards the desired level of maturity de carolis et al schumacher et al roy wend ler the mtd must consider the diferences of the industries and their stages of development so that their diagnosis and clasification of the maturity level are related to the reality of the organization aghamiri et al carijo et al reyes et al because the digital transformation has diferent efects in diferent industries and those with customer orientation and relationship busines to consumer bc are afected by digitalization faster and much more than those with busines to busines relationships carijo et al demlehner laumer the authors becker et al de carolis et al nerima ralyté and soares et al define that mtds can serve thre functionalities diferent descriptive those that analyze the level of maturity and the curent objective of the company prescriptive those that present guides for the company to achieve the desired level of maturity focuses on the relationships of the domain with performance and indicates how to aproach improving maturity to positively afect the value of the busines and comparative when comparing the curent level with the market benchmarking and the maturity levels of competitors model of this nature could compare similar practices betwen organizations to compare maturity within diferent industries however the mtd may be descriptive by design but may develop roadmap and present the consequences of its comparative aplication golhardt et al another clasification of mtds is provided by golhardt et al who state that in general two types of mtd can be distinguished the aproachchapter quite clasicaly specifies individual maturity in the form of fixed levels where the scale five levels is the most comon these fixed levels can be stagered or continuous and focus area maturity models on the other hand each criterion can have disparate levels of maturity in terms of quantity and distance from each other van stenbergen et al based on the rsl transformation the maturity model of technology adoption in an educational organization meo dirk ifenthaler eglofstein is an evaluation tol that alows self asesment for management and digital field as an exemplary aplication case the measurement instrument for multidimensional integrated model of digital transformation rodríguez abitia bribiesca corea provides mechanism to evaluate in and improve the pr ocident however items can be customize for particular contexts in terms of industry size or other environmental diferences to beter adapt to the neds of organizations under evaluation the new digital maturity model for project sales vos et al analysis of the degre of maturity of the digital transformation of an organization model that has ben developed in the context to suport decisions apropriate strategies for digital transformation based on an analysis of the state curent of the company mtds developed for aplication without distension industrial or sectoral in contrast to these models the digital readines asesment dra kpmg walner kpmg ofers valid and tailored instrument to any company for rapid and efective implementation of the digital transformation the dra can be used in al phases of the digital transformation and makes your progres is measurable the digital transformation playbok rogers focuses into practical tols and frameworks that organizations can aply to make decisions and formulate strategies for your own busines regardles of its size or industry its goal is for organizations to discover the next stage of creation of value and growth for your busines the digital culture model developed lorenzo ochoa configures and explains the digital culture of any organization through dimensions experimentation development and deployment and leadership and transformation with the aim of transforming the busines model or models organizational proceses to create value for customers employes and shareholders and the digital maturity in traditional industries remane et al proposes two scales for describe the digital maturity of company first the impact that the digital transformation in specific company secondly the preparation of the company to master the changes that are coming and verify the usefulnes of this measure of two scales by empiricaly deriving five groups or clusters of digital maturity the organizational agility maturity model gunsberg et al and the company readines evaluation for digital busines transformation isaev et al are models that provide solution to the problem of evaluating the preparation of the it department for digital busines transformation through the development of quantitative asesment of the maturity level of the it department proceses to met the neds of the company the first is specificaly model benchmark required to measure the agility of the entire organization within information services division based on the agility maturity model wendler organizational analysis wendler chapter mtd aimed at comparing mature companies digitaly with what not and define key suces factors aligning the organization for its digital future kane et al is aimed at discover how digitaly maturing companies adopt digital transformation and what distinguishes them and analyze the nature of the gap betwen companies that mature digitaly and early stage companies and how companies mature they continue to move forward the digital future readines transformation model schlaepfer et al also aligns with this direction since it reflects the level of preparation of industrial and consumer companies for the digital future and focuses on the extent to which the manufacturing location is suitable for the digital age the key skils that digitalization requires and the transformations that wil be esential for companies that wish to position themselves as prepared for the future likewise the maturity model for asesing the digital readines of manufacturing companies dreamy de carolis et al focuses on answering the question are manufacturing companies ready to go digital by ofering tol to answer it using maturity asesment method to measure the digital readines of manufacturing companies based on inspiring principles of the cmi capability maturity model integration framework the transformation of the sector manufacturing towards industry sets the stage for great industrial change acording to this panorama the maturity asesment for industry coli et al provides new digital maturity asesment aproach digital maturity asesment which is based on the problem based learning pbl companies with those that are no and define key suces factors mtd that manage gap analysis based on the curent state and the ideal mtds designed with reference framework aproach mtd with maturity as
