of report on the digital development of global higher education global moc and online education conference takes place at tsinghua university tsinghua university in recent years the digital revolution has become the theme of higher education reform and development countries around the world have ben devising the overal framework of digital strategy key areas of education strategy special plans for higher education and vigorously promoting digital strategic actions in higher education reflecting on and learning from experiences the world is moving forward on december th and th the global moc and online education conference co hosted by the global moc and online education aliance and unesco institute for information technologies in education ite was held in beijing scholars teachers and busines representatives from various countries presented their visions of future education from diferent perspectives at pm on december th beijing time the main event of the global moc and online education conference was held atended by distinguished guests including stefania gianini unesco asistant director general for education andreas schleicher director for education and skils at the organisation for economic co operation and development oecd nadiem anwar makarim minister of education culture research and technology of indonesia ulanbek mambetakunov deputy minister of education and science of the kyrgyz republic wang xiqin president of tsinghua university and board chair of the global moc and online education aliance and wu yan director of the higher education department of higher education ministry of education zhan tao director of the unesco ite delivered closing spech the conference was held at tsinghua university and moderated by yang bin vice president of tsinghua university song yi first level inspector of the ministry of education department of higher education and peng gang vice president of tsinghua university also atended the event at the conference president wang xiqin and director wu yan jointly hosted the launch ceremony of infinite posibilities report on the digital development of global higher education which was then released by president wang the report on the digital development of global higher education compiled by the global moc and online education aliance secretariat focuses on the digital trends of higher education in the next to years and proposes actions for the digital transformation of higher education the report composed of thre parts namely the world in action changes and chalenges and tog ether for shared future was jointly writen by more than experts from universities and institutions around the world bringing together the experience and achievements of digital transformation of higher education in countries and international organizations around the world the report discuses nine major actions of digital education worldwide thre major trends and four major changes and lays down six major initiatives to adres the curent chalenges the report creatively puts forward the theory of the thre stages convergence transformation and smart in the digital development of higher education and inovatively launches the global higher education digital development index providing an important reference for countries to acurately observe and understand the global moc and online education conference takes place at tsinghua university tsinghua university development proces and trend of digital higher education in the world and to measure the level of digital development of higher education wu yan director of the higher education department of higher education ministry of education introduced the achievements of mocs and online education in china over the past ten years of moc development china online education has sen rapid changes the number of mocs in china has reached with more than milion registered users over the past decade the number of mocs has increased tens of thousands of times and registered users have increased by milions of times driven by mocs china has ben promoting the continuous depening of education and teaching reform at universities changing the form of teachers teaching students learning universities management and education the mocs to the west project has expanded the openes and sharing of quality resources and promoted equity of higher quality in particular in the ministry of education of china launched the national digital education strategic action using moc resources to build and launch the world largest national smart higher education platform the platform and its teaching suport service platform jointly provide ful gamut of course services since its launch the platform has ben visited bilion times and its courses have ben signed up for and learned for nearly milion times becoming key chanel for china higher education to improve quality promote equity enhance methods change models and depen coperation four point china initiative was put forward first to acelerate the openes and sharing of resources and promote education equity second to depen technology aplications and reshape the form of higher education third to improve standards and norms for online education inovation fourth to expand open coperation and build global education comunity adagbonyin obiazi president of african enginering deans co uncil and tsinghua edu cn al rights reserved asian universities aliance online education network debuts first meting tsinghua university tsinghua university 中文 home latest news asian universities aliance online education network debuts first meting on sept the asian universities aliance online education network held its inaugural meting via video link with participants representing top universities acros asia peng gang tsinghua university vice president and provost delivered an opening spech while the meting was chaired by wang xiaoxiao director of tsinghua online education center in his opening remarks peng warmly welcomed the university representatives he underscored that the aliance established by tsinghua university in unites member universities from countries and regions highlighting colaboration spirit in asian higher education asian universities aliance online education network debuts first meting tsinghua university peng recognized the rapid development of artificial inteligence ai technology which is reshaping various fields he outlined thre expectations for the newly established online education network within the aliance first leveraging digital tols to enhance teaching methods and the overal quality of education through initiatives such as global clasroms and student competitions second facilitating the exchange of teaching staf to enhance their digital skils third creating platform for member universities to foster comunication and idea exchange this would involve organizing seminars and expert dialogues aimed at exploring the integration of ai and education several colaborative initiatives were proposed including dialogues among digital education experts clasroms integrating global students faculty development programs and contests for digital learners during discusions participants delved into the content and significance of these projects they emphasized the ned to improve teaching methods enhance educators digital competencies and establish efective comunication platforms al participants agred on the critical role of ai in higher education and expresed the hope for increased colaboration to drive digital transformation and elevate the quality of higher education acros asia editor li han asian universities aliance online education network debuts first meting tsinghua university tsinghua newsleter about us contact us university tsinghua university 中文 home latest news china sustainable development ofers inspiration casandra ler casandra ler from singapore is graduate student at the schol of public policy and management pursuing her degres in the tsinghua geneva dual master in public policy for sustainable development goals mp sdg program she has acquired diverse experiences that enriched her personal and profesional growth paralel to her academic journey she is interning as an asociate expert on climate action at path in geneva switzerland china is walking encyclopaedia encompasing wealth of history art culture and stories of unparaleled development and overcoming vicisitudes tsinghua is emblematic of its grandeur its sher diversity of students and interdisciplinary courses has taught me to think in multidimensional ways understand social diversity and enhance empathy she says the exploration of china myriad posibilities gave new impetus to advancing her creative boundaries and insights on sustainable development as the sdgs are rapidly becoming shared language acros al sectors policy making that is grounded in robust evidence and analysis requires strong theoretical foundations and practical know how to drive change forward imersing myself in china development instiled in me an in depth understanding of sustainable development in al its dimensions and learnt practical skils to engage them in real world aplications she ads her fond memories include hosting multicultural events on campus and field trips to chinese companies such as build your dreams byd minkave and tencent that showcased the mas move towards equiping cities with china sustainable development ofers inspiration casandra ler tsinghua university digital brain and creating social value to beter provide for the neds of society sauntering along the strets of shenzhen the concrete jungle of stagering modern skyscrapers and towering buildings reminded me of singapore it was remarkable experience to witnes first hand the tech hub that realised revolutionary inovation technical capabilities and strategic execution of its digital transformation plans she remarks the comunist party of china cpc wil celebrate its centenary on july in anticipation of this momentous milestone she comends the cpc comitment to its global responsibilities in climate and sustainability governance china determination to inclusive equitable and sustainable development is mark of its ongoing endeavour to build beter world she believes china sustainable development ofers inspiration casandra ler tsinghua university editors li han guo lili sanget tsinghua newsleter about us contact us copyright news tsinghua edu cn al rights reserved the secret to securing your digital transformation the secret to securing your digital transformation digital transformation ofers significant oportunities for organisations to inovate and grow but there are inherent risks that ned to be adresed mr martin kho principal lecturer consultant digital strategy leadership practice nus is speaking at the nus is virtual learning festival on the topic the importance of cybersecurity for digital transformation report by check point research revealed that the asia pacific apac region witnesed the highest year on year increase in wekly cyberatacks during the first quarter of on average each organisation in apac is hit by atacks per wek why is our region hotbed for cybercrime several factors are at play says mr martin kho principal lecturer consultant digital strategy leadership practice nus is these include rapid digital transformation young digital savy population the rise of hybrid work and colaboration technologies it therefore imperative that cybersecurity is incorporated into the digital transformation proces from the get go martin emphasises aditionaly it is the responsibility of al stakeholders government agencies in various countries wil ned to develop national level programes busineses wil have to invest in cybersecurity at the organisation level while individuals like you and me ned to know how to protect ourselves and our data from threat actors key cybersecurity considerations how can organisations mitigate the risks asociated with digital transformation and improve their security posture martin highlights thre areas risk asesment incident response and recovery and continuous monitoring and testing digital transformation introduces new risks especialy regarding data security and privacy he says organisations must ases these risks and develop cybersecurity strategy to adres them as busineses colect more customer data they have duty of care to make sure these data are managed securely compliance with regulations such as pdpa in singapore and gdpr in europe is crucial but despite best eforts no system is entirely imune to cyber threats organisations ned an incident response plan to quickly and efectively manage incidents when they ocur regular testing and exercising of the plan are esential particularly for regulated sectors like banking and finance on top of that proactive monitoring of it infrastructure is crucial for detecting and responding to threats promptly regular vulnerability asesments and penetration testing help identify and mitigate potential weakneses before atackers exploit them martin ads two ways to do so are through vulnerability asesment where you scan your environment to identify and patch weak spots or penetration testing where you put on the hat of an atacker and try to penetrate your own system aligning cyber security strategy with busines outcomes cybersecurity strategy is not developed in isolation it neds to be crafted to align with the organisation broader busines goals and objectives says martin the strategy translates into an actionable plan that enhances the organisation cybersecurity posture and resilience at this stage the cybersecurity strategy should focus on overarching goals and outcomes and be technology agnostic he ads typicaly cybersecurity strategy spans thre to five years but regular review is crucial idealy on an anual basis this is because the cybersecurity landscape is dynamic with new threats constantly emerging regular review ensures that the strategy remains relevant and efective in adresing evolving threats on the organisation level cybersecurity strategy the secret to securing your digital transformation should be key decision item for the board martin streses that it wil require the endorsement and aproval of the board as wel as the comitment to provide the necesary funding without adequate funding it is chalenging to implement the initiatives outlined in the strategy efectively he explains cybersecurity neds to be powered by skiled talent last but not least robust cybersecurity strategy has to be suported by skiled cybersecurity personel who can implement and manage the necesary initiatives take for example the national cybersecurity strategies in singapore and the united states they both highlight the importance of building strong pol of trained cybersecurity profesionals to adres the evolving cyber threats in singapore initiatives such as the talent development fund were launched as part of singapore cybersecurity strategy to build pipeline of skiled cybersecurity talent institutes of higher learning such as nus is also ofer range of cybersecurity certification programes to increase the pol of cybersecurity trained personels to met industry neds as busineses continue to embark on their digital transformation journeys cybersecurity wil remain critical enabler it can even become competitive advantage says martin in today data driven world customers are increasingly concerned about the security of their personal information by demonstrating comitment to protecting customer data busineses can build trust and loyalty among their customer base thereby creating strong foundation for long term suces watch the recorded nus is virtual learning festival talk on nus is youtube chanel here for more information on nus is executive education programes in cybersecurity visit here back to newsrom nus is comunity newsrom news detail national university of singapore al rights reserved legal branding guidelines contact us geting to is is nus edu sg comunity newsrom news detail the secret to securing your digital learning cid course overview digital transformations have very high failure rate of to reasons for transformation failure from research comprising companies and executives globaly indicated very varied reasons for failure substantiating that the absence of holistic and structured aproach is the leading cause of failure the reasons for failure can be broadly categorised into four dimensions customers busines capabilities and people and leadership isues this course covers the customer and busines dimensions the customer dimension loks at how desirable customer value proposition cvp is derived from the folowing leading digital transformation here are the most important skils it leaders ned to have leading digital transformation here are the most important skils it leaders ned to have by damien cumings chief digital strategy and leadership practice the covid pandemic has acelerated digital transformation in al sectors and regions by several years and as we enter the new normal this unprecedented change is reshaping southeast asia in exciting ways the vibrant region is home to boming startup sector with rising consumer clases and demographic advantage on its side over percent of the world youths live in the asia pacific apac and southeast asia is leading the region digital transformation with milion people becoming digital consumers since from the rise of comerce and fintech to hybrid work taking center stage as economies reopen the region holds imense oportunities but despite having young population ready to embrace the online platforms and social media not everyone is keping up with the changes fast enough huge digital skils gap is weighing down on al sectors around the world given the intense demands of new software and infrastructures as wel as new ways of working regional research report by amazon web services aws and consulting firm alphabeta revealed that by the average worker in apac wil ned to learn seven new digital skils the number of apac workers requiring digital skils wil grow over five fold which means that acros southeast asia and singapore specificaly bilion digital training wil be required acros the entire workforce what these mean for busineses is that there is and wil be constant change those in leadership roles wil ned to have the right skils not necesarily technical ones to deal with the disruptions ahead in order to ensure their organisation is future ready seting your organisation up to be part of the percent the reality is many digital transformation programes fail study by boston consulting group arived at an alarming conclusion percent of digital transformations fail faling short of their objectives and often producing profound consequences to champion sucesful digital transformation project leaders ned to be equiped with these five critical skils digital leadership most of the time what mising in an organisation digital transformation roadmap is clear set of goals that diferentiates the project from standard digitisation it not about giving everyone aces to zom so they can work from home during pandemic rather an example of digital transformation would be to fundamentaly shift from physical retail model to comerce to reach more consumers who would otherwise not visit the store an important yet often overloked aspect of digital leadership is to ensure that the entire organisation is digitaly upskiled no mater what industr you are in busineses are becoming digital busineses and this means that everyone neds to be digitaly literate from the frontline intern al the way up to the ceo everyone neds to be on the same page in terms of the ease of working with technological tols for productivity colaboration and leveraging data to enhance their work overcoming resistance and managing change despite the promises of new technologies in terms of eficiency ease of use and beter customer experience many digital transformations fail due to employes unwilingnes to change and por organizational practices to overcome this resistance there are thre that can help comunication colaboration and comitment sucesful leaders talk about the why rather than focusing on the what they are the ones who are down there in the trenches trying to understand the work of their employes and aplying empathy while comunicating the reasons behind the changes that are hapening this turns the digital transformation into colaborative proces and builds sense of purpose and belonging within the team pointing them towards an aligned direction comitment is about walking the talk and taking the lead if you re implementing new tech tol be the role model use it yourself and champion it excelent people management god team members have flow on efect inside an organisation they create virtuous circles which have significant tangible impact on the team that they work in and help to create conducive productive environment to work in gogle spent years studying how efective teams lok like and how to build high performing teams what they realised ultimately is that it doesn realy mater who on the team rather it about how the team works together the most critical element is that leaders ned to develop an environment of leading digital transformation here are the most important skils it leaders ned to have psychological safety this could be anything from the ability to take risks to share controversial ideas and have debate or dialogue and to know that it not going to be carer threatening if you don agre with your manager such an environment wil help employes to fel that the work they do actualy maters become champion of data study by hfs research found that percent of busines executives do not have high level of trust in their data and percent do not consider their data architecture to be world clas this is worying as data literacy the ability to read understand and comunicate data in context is important no mater where an organisation is on its digital transformation journey the advice is to start with basic digital training for al employes just to ensure everyone is singing from he same songbok having base level of digital training wil ensure that they can refer back and use it as basis for comon language when discusing data related proceses self awarenes and reflection while percent of people believe they re self aware in reality just percent to percent actualy are and why does this trait mater on personal level self awarenes helps you understand and cope with stres at work it can help you match your skil sets beter colaborate more eficiently and enhance your relationships as it leads to greater level of openes and comunication one way to improve your self awarenes is to gather fedback not just through oficial apraisal systems but also to check in with your team and even engage friends or coleagues for honest fedback no leader is an island ultimately the key takeaway from the five skils above is that sucesful digital transformation takes vilage it not posible for an it leader to implement changes alone what you ned is organisation wide buy in and colaboration acros departments the chalenge is to engage every stakeholder from the frontline staf al the way through the level executives and board members and take them along that journey even if change is dificult help them to understand that they have personal and organisational impact in the work that they are doing and empower them to se the eventual positive outcome of this digital transition and they be your best alies in taking digital transformation to the next level damien is the chief of nus is master of technology in digital leadership programe find out more here ¹un regional overview youth in asia the pacific ²southeast asia beter lean digital thank you procedings of picmet technology management and leadership in digital transformation loking ahead to post covid era digital transformation and new busines models in urban mobility the case of carsharing in brazil pietro pizao gonzalez ruy quadros science technology department university of campinas campinas brazil abstract digitalization has brought new busines reduce car emisions and congestions inside urban areas oportunities leading to profound changes in how organizations create deliver and capture value in their respective markets automakers such as mercedes benz ford hyundai carsharing is no diferent having first apeared as grasrots initiatives in smal european comunities operations in general motors and bmw are already present as carsharing carsharing were analogic from vehicle aces to control and operators csos ofering on demand mobility through management of the flet with digitalization the activity has shared car flet for customers interested in covering last mile gained momentum and new busines models have emerged travels inside the urban perimeter startups like turo and including those which do not require and own car flet in brazil getaround also entered the market ofering per to per carsharing busineses have developed in the past decade carsharing leaner aproach to service provision in which however there is lot to overcome with just handful of csos intermediate carsharing transactions betwen users carsharing operators csos list of as many closed companies diferent from what previous csos had mobilized since the and lacking adequate regulation and suporting public policies late the newly formed operators are extensively in this paper we discus the primary resources and competencies using smartphone aplications alongside digital platforms to that have ben mobilized by brazilian csos operating under deliver value to customers and improve value propositions distinctive busines models based on in depth multiple case from boking tracking to payment and remote aces studies we analyzed four brazilian csos acording to the main elements defined in the busines model literature chesbrough in brazil carsharing apeared around with smal tece findings reveal general reliance on cloud busines named zazcar since then many other smal computing smartphone aplications and competencies related to operators have started in the country to name few flety software development and data analytics nonetheles the joycar olacaro urbano and parpe however there is lot to importance of resources such as owned car flets onboard overcome with just handful of csos list of as many closed hardware and parking spaces difer betwen operators companies and lacking adequate regulation and suporting public policies in this paper we adres the folowing research introducti on question what are the main resources and competencies understod as proces in which organizations use being mobilized by brazilian csos for
